title: remove my low priority queue
body: so i never went afk i just walked a little bit every minute since i didnt want to play since my adc was just flaming the entire game. and yet i got 5 new low priority queue games. wtf riot remove it

replies.body: Locking this since it's run its course. If you'd like to discuss your own penalty then please make separate threads than reviving finished discussions. Contact us at [Boards Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/315677006358380544) or Discuss the Boards if you'd like to dispute this lock.

>so i never went afk i just walked a little bit every minute

You were not contributing = afk

>since i didnt want to play since my adc was just flaming the entire game.

In cases like this, I'd recommend just muting the player and continue playing. You essentially ruined the game for the 5 players and the enemy team, and 4 players on your team. How would it feel to be in the top lane, and have someone stop playing and just give up because they were arguing resulting in a loss of LP? It would probably feel bad, and you'd want to person that game up to be penalized.

> and yet i got 5 new low priority queue games. wtf riot remove it

Of course you got a Leaver Buster penalty. You knew that this penalty system existed when you had to type 'I Agree' after leaving your first time, so it should come as no surprise. We do not reverse penalties that are not issues in error.

TLDR;
In the future, just mute people you don't want to see chat from, proceed to gain LP.

>**Okay then, I'll just move around occasionally to avoid getting hit by Leaverbuster.**

Also, unless you actively stalk those players you have no way of knowing whether they got punished or not, and even then it's not a perfect way of finding out as some players just so happen to take long breaks from LoL which can give the false impression that they got 2-week or permabanned if they were just taking a break from the game.

**Why am I stuck in Low Priority Queue and how can I get out of it?**

Continuing to leave/afk games will increase the time that you remain in LPQ. To get out of it simply play 5 matchmade games without leaving/afking, it's really that simple.
